name: Chariot Kings
description:
Chariot Kings is a fast-paced, 4 player, local multi-player, platform racing game, where you compete against friends or bots in ancient Rome.

Fight for the crown in this disturbingly humorous slave whipping simulator. Whip your slave using your favorite emperor or empress and reach the top using brute force and an array of weapons and power up's.

Play by yourself, or play with your friends ;) (friends must consent to being played with) with the option of up to 3 CPU players. Chariot Kings can be played both solo and multi-player.


Chariot Kings is best played with a controller, but offers up to 2 players on one keyboard.

If you enjoy the game please consider purchasing.

Features:

  • 1-4 Player (either bots or human players or both!)
  • Slave whipping
  • 4 diverse maps spanning the whole of ancient pixel-Rome
  • 7 varied weapons and power ups offering potentially game changing effects. ie. (muscle tonic)
  • The ability to throw sheep at your friends
